rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: Referred to Consulting or Datafix Provided

Flow.description: Updates case fields based on email message records created

value.stringValue: (BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].Subject), 'your request is outside annual support and maintenance') || BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].Subject), 'sandbox: your request is outside annual support and maintenance') || BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].Subject), 'datafix provided:') || BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].Subject), 'sandbox: datafix provided:')) && BEGINS( LOWER([EmailMessage].FromAddress) , 't1support') && NOT(ISPICKVAL( [EmailMessage].Status , '5')) /*not draft email*/ && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: (BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'your request is outside annual support and maintenance') || BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'sandbox: your request is outside annual support and maintenance') || BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'datafix provided:') || BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'sandbox: datafix provided:')) && BEGINS( LOWER({!myVariable_current.FromAddress}) , 't1support') && NOT(ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Status} , '5')) /*not draft email*/ && NOT( {!$Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c} )

value.stringValue: (BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].Subject), 'request for more information:') || BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].Subject), 'sandbox: request for more information:')) && BEGINS( LOWER([EmailMessage].FromAddress) , 't1support') && NOT(ISPICKVAL([EmailMessage].Status , '5')) /*not draft email*/ && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_11
formulas.expression: (BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'request for more information:') || BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'sandbox: request for more information:')) && BEGINS( LOWER({!myVariable_current.FromAddress}) , 't1support') && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status} , '5')) /*not draft email*/ && NOT( {!$Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c} )

value.stringValue: (BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].Subject), 'request for environment access') || BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].Subject), 'sandbox: request for environment access')) && BEGINS( LOWER([EmailMessage].FromAddress) , 't1support') && NOT(ISPICKVAL([EmailMessage].Status , '5')) /*not draft email*/ && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_13
formulas.expression: (BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'request for environment access') || BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'sandbox: request for environment access')) && BEGINS( LOWER({!myVariable_current.FromAddress}) , 't1support') && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status} , '5')) /*not draft email*/ && NOT( {!$Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c} )

value.stringValue: /* This rule assumes any inbound email from T1Support results from an email sent by an Employee within a Community. It's purpose is to clear the New Customer Info flags */ BEGINS( LOWER([EmailMessage].FromAddress) , 't1support') && CONTAINS (LOWER([EmailMessage].ToAddress), LOWER([EmailMessage].Parent.Contact.Email )) && NOT(ISPICKVAL([EmailMessage].Status , '5')) /* not draft email */ && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_15
formulas.expression: /* This rule assumes any inbound email from T1Support results from an email sent by an Employee within a Community. It's purpose is to clear the New Customer Info flags */ BEGINS( LOWER({!myVariable_current.FromAddress}) , 't1support') && CONTAINS (LOWER({!myVariable_current.ToAddress}), LOWER({!myVariable_current.Parent.Contact.Email} )) && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status} , '5')) /* not draft email */ && NOT( {!$Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c} )

value.stringValue: /*Change the status to In Progress from either Awaiting Customer or Resolved status when incoming email is received from any email address other than t1support */ [EmailMessage].Incoming = True && (ISPICKVAL([EmailMessage].Parent.Status, 'Awaiting Customer') || ISPICKVAL( [EmailMessage].Parent.Status, 'Resolved') || ISPICKVAL( [EmailMessage].Parent.Status, 'With Customer')) && NOT(BEGINS(LOWER( [EmailMessage].FromAddress ), 't1support')) && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_18
formulas.expression: /*Change the status to In Progress from either Awaiting Customer or Resolved status when incoming email is received from any email address other than t1support */ {!myVariable_current.Incoming} = True && (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Parent.Status}, 'Awaiting Customer') || ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Parent.Status}, 'Resolved') || ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Parent.Status}, 'With Customer')) && NOT(BEGINS(LOWER( {!myVariable_current.FromAddress} ), 't1support')) && NOT( {!$Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c} )

value.stringValue: /* Email response received except from t1support */ [EmailMessage].Incoming = True && NOT(BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].FromAddress), 't1support')) && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_20
formulas.expression: /* Email response received except from t1support */ {!myVariable_current.Incoming} = True && NOT(BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.FromAddress}), 't1support')) && NOT( {!$Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c} )

value.stringValue: (BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].Subject), 'referred to consulting team') || BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].Subject), 'sandbox: referred to consulting team')) && BEGINS( LOWER([EmailMessage].FromAddress) , 't1support') && NOT(ISPICKVAL([EmailMessage].Status, '5')) /*not draft email*/ && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3
formulas.expression: (BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'referred to consulting team') || BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'sandbox: referred to consulting team')) && BEGINS( LOWER({!myVariable_current.FromAddress}) , 't1support') && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status}, '5')) /*not draft email*/ && NOT( {!$Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c} )

value.stringValue: (BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].Subject), 'service request estimate approval required:') || BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].Subject), 'sandbox: service request estimate approval required:')) && BEGINS ( LOWER ([EmailMessage].FromAddress ) , 't1support') && NOT( ISPICKVAL ( [EmailMessage].Status , '5')) /*not draft email*/ && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression: (BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'service request estimate approval required:') || BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'sandbox: service request estimate approval required:')) && BEGINS ( LOWER ({!myVariable_current.FromAddress} ) , 't1support') && NOT( ISPICKVAL ( {!myVariable_current.Status} , '5')) /*not draft email*/ && NOT( {!$Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c} )

value.stringValue: (BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].Subject), 'service request testing required:') || BEGINS(LOWER([EmailMessage].Subject), 'sandbox: service request testing required:')) && BEGINS( LOWER([EmailMessage].FromAddress) , 't1support') && NOT(ISPICKVAL([EmailMessage].Status, '5')) /*not draft email*/ && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_7
formulas.expression: (BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'service request testing required:') || BEGINS(LOWER({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'sandbox: service request testing required:')) && BEGINS( LOWER({!myVariable_current.FromAddress}) , 't1support') && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status}, '5')) /*not draft email*/ && NOT( {!$Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c} )

value.stringValue: (BEGINS( LOWER ([EmailMessage].Subject), 'case confirmed with development') || BEGINS( LOWER ([EmailMessage].Subject), 'sandbox: case confirmed with development')) && BEGINS( LOWER ([EmailMessage].FromAddress) , 't1support') && ([EmailMessage].Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName == "Incident" || [EmailMessage].Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName == "Question") && NOT(ISPICKVAL([EmailMessage].Status , '5')) /*not draft email*/ && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_9
formulas.expression: (BEGINS( LOWER ({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'case confirmed with development') || BEGINS( LOWER ({!myVariable_current.Subject}), 'sandbox: case confirmed with development')) && BEGINS( LOWER ({!myVariable_current.FromAddress}) , 't1support') && ({!myVariable_current.Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName} == "Incident" || {!myVariable_current.Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName} == "Question") && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status} , '5')) /*not draft email*/ && NOT( {!$Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c} )

Flow.label: Email Message Inbound or Outbound
